name: Pandora's Madness
description:
Pandora's Madness A museum’s security guard tries to survive madness after opening Pandora’s box by mistake. The museum has changed, and its statues have gained life, chasing the guard whenever he looks at them. To preserve his sanity, the guard will have to find an escape from the museum before the statues get to him.

Controls:
WASD - Move
LeftClick - Interact/Use
RightClick - Drop Object
P - Pause game

Tips and tricks:
- You lose more sanity the closer you look at statues, keep your distance!
- Use fountains to recover your sanity and save your progress!



This is a student project created in 4 months. Development team:
